posts.title: Meeting Reminder
posts.body: Don't forget about the team meeting at 9 AM. Please be on time.

posts.title: Project Deadline
posts.body: The deadline for the project submission is approaching. Ensure all tasks are completed by 5 PM.

posts.title: Lunch Break
posts.body: Reminder to take a lunch break at 12:30 PM. Enjoy your meal!

posts.title: Team Outing Running
posts.body: Join us for a team outing on August 15th at 6 PM. It will be a fun evening with games and dinner.
